snippet: J.C. Penney reported last week that its sales had fallen 26.1 percent in the most recent quarter, but Ronald B. Johnson, its chief executive, promoted the success of the company's store renovation plan.
abstract: J.C. Penney reported last week that its sales had fallen 26.1 percent in the most recent quarter, but Ronald B. Johnson, its chief executive, promoted the success of the company's store renovation plan.

headline.main: A Dose of Realism for the Chief of J.C. Penney
headline.print_headline: A Dose Of Realism For the Chief Of J.C. Penney
